Text: The cover image and the description are for two different movies. I am DLing now to find out which one this is.
This, again, is the Michael Madsen version.

This is the Correct Movie if this has MM in it: http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1622991/

Infected (II) (2013)

A blood virus infects a small group of hunters turning a father & son trip into a fight for survival.

Director: Glenn Ciano
Writers: Glenn Ciano (screenplay), Glenn Ciano (story), 1 more credit »
